#TITLE Sentinal
#ALBUM Front Mission: Gun Hazard
#COMPOSER Nobuo Uematsu, Yasunori Mitsuda, Junya Nakano, Masashi Hamauzu
#ARRANGED Gi Nattak

#WAVE 0x20 0x0D ## strings (FF6)
#WAVE 0x21 0x0E ## trumpet (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x02 ## electric bass (FF6)
#WAVE 0x23 0x12 ## cymbal (FF6)
#WAVE 0x24 0x14 ## snare (FF6)
#WAVE 0x25 0x16 ## timpani (FF6)
#WAVE 0x26 0x62 ## crowd noise (FF6)
